thread.title: La La Land mistakenly handed best picture Oscar
thread.title_full: La La Land mistakenly handed best picture Oscar

title: La La Land mistakenly handed best picture Oscar
text:
27 February 2017 at 5:27am La La Land mistakenly handed best picture Oscar Fred Berger, foreground center, and the cast of Credit: Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP 
The Oscars was plunged into chaos as La La land was mistakenly announced as the best picture, the actual winner was Moonlight. 
Presenter Warren Beatty says he paused so long before the name was read because the envelope read Emma Stone, "La La Land." 
Actress Faye Dunaway read the name "La La Land" after chiding Beatty for taking so long to read the winner. 
Moonlight tells the story of a boy's journey to adulthood through his rough upbringing in Miami. The film stars Naomi Harris as the boy's drug-addicted mother, and Mahershala Ali as a drug dealer-turned mentor for the boy. 
"Moonlight" has provided some of the stiffest competition during Hollywood's awards season for the musical "La La Land," which was nominated for a history-tying 14 Academy Awards. 
More follows.
